sentences: Discussions on the TAR concluded at IPCC-17 and IPCC-18.
At IPCC-17, held from 4-6 April 2001, in Nairobi, Kenya, participants accepted the actions of the three IPCC Working Groups with regard to adopting their contributions to the TAR.
They considered progress on the TAR Synthesis Report, and discussed in depth the future of the IPCC.

Participants also approved the preparation of a technical paper on the links between biological diversity and climate change, and considered a proposal for a special report on climate change and sustainable development.
